fulltext: oai:lindat.mff.cuni.cz:11372/LRT-1180;2016-04-06T16:39:51Z;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0007-710A-A;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0007-710B-8;Corpus Work Bench CWB (CQP);This SOAP service implements the IMS Open Corpus Workbench (CWB), a collection of open-source tools for managing and querying large text corpora (ranging from 10 million to 2 billion words) with linguistic annotations. Its central component is the flexible and efficient query processor CQP. The service makes it possible to index a new corpus and query it.;2014-07-30;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11372/LRT-1180;downloadable_files_count: 0;Spain;Institut Universitari de Lingüística Aplicada, Universitat Pompeu Fabra;http://gilmere.upf.edu/cqp_invoker/queries
name: e0d11c3f-1e40-5994-9c1d-635ad6e95606
notes: This SOAP service implements the IMS Open Corpus Workbench (CWB), a collection of open-source tools for managing and querying large text corpora (ranging from 10 million to 2 billion words) with linguistic annotations. Its central component is the flexible and efficient query processor CQP. The service makes it possible to index a new corpus and query it.
title: Corpus Work Bench CWB (CQP)
